title: Snow
textArray: Snow is a form of ice
Snow forms when water in the atmosphere becomes frozen

Snow comes in all different shapes and sizes.
At the freezing point of water (0° Celsius, 32° Fahrenheit), snow melts and becomes liquid water
Sometimes, snow will melt very fast and become water vapor
This is called sublimation

The opposite, where water vapor becomes snow, is called deposition.
Snow is used for some winter sport activities like skiing and sledding
Sometimes people make artificial snow so they can ski

People also commonly build things out of snow for fun.
Snow can also be dangerous, as it can lower visibility and make driving very difficult
When it snows, the snow will melt a little during the daytime and freeze again at night
This makes ice which can make driving conditions very treacherous
Snow plows are used to remove snow from roads to make driving easier and safer
Also, sand or salt may be added to the road to help tires grip the road
When salt is mixed with snow, the snow will melt more easily

This is because salt water has a lower melting point than fresh water (water without salt).
A blizzard is a dangerous type of a snowstorm
A blizzard produces strong winds that keep the snow in the air, thus reducing visibility
Sometimes it produces thunder snow, which is snow with lightning and thunder.

title: Tea
textArray: Tea is a drink that is popular all over the world
It is made by soaking the dried leaves or flowers of the plant Camellia sinensis in hot water
Tea can have other herbs, spices, or fruit flavours in it, like lemon
All teas are made from the Camellia sinensis plant
Sometimes the word "tea" is used for other drinks that have been made by soaking fruit or herbs in hot water, like "rosehip tea" or "camomile tea"
These are called "herbal teas".

title: Rain
textArray: Rain is a kind of precipitation
Precipitation is any kind of water that falls from clouds in the sky, like rain, hail, sleet and snow
It is measured by a rain gauge

Rain is part of the water cycle.
Clouds will often absorb smoke to create rain, commonly referred to as "nature's laundry" due to this process.
Some places have frequent rain
This makes rainforests
Some have little rain

This makes deserts.
A rainstorm is a sudden heavy fall of rain
It may cause flash floods in valleys
Heavy rain for a long time may make floods that destroy houses and drown people
Also, landslides may happen.

title: Oceans
textArray: An ocean is a large area of water between continents
Oceans are very big and they join smaller seas together
Oceans (or marine biomes) cover 72% of our planet

It covers 1/3 of the Earth's surface.There are five main oceans together.They are:
1.Pacific Ocean
2.Atlantic Ocean
3.Indian Ocean 
4

Southern Ocean 
5

Arctic Ocean
The largest ocean is the Pacific Ocean.The smallest ocean is Arctic ocean

Big and small fish of different types live in oceans,  like: Crabs, starfish, sharks, whales, dolphins etc.

Different water movements separate the Southern Ocean from the Atlantic, Pacific and Indian Oceans
The Southern ocean is also called the Antarctic Ocean, because it covers the area around Antarctica
The deepest ocean is the Pacific ocean
The deep ocean is characterised by cold temperatures, high pressure, and complete darkness
Some very unusual organisms live in this part of the ocean
They do not require energy from the sun to survive, because they use chemicals  from deep inside the Earth.

title: Mountains
textArray: A mountain is a large natural rise of the Earth's surface that usually has a "summit" (the name for a mountain's top, which can also be called a peak)
It is usually steeper and taller than a hill
Mountains are often thought of as being a hill which is larger than 600 metres (about 2,000 feet)
However, some definitions say a mountain is a hill larger than 300 meters (about 1,000 feet).

title: Oatmeal
textArray: Oatmeal is a meal made of oats
It is normally made for breakfast
Oatmeal can also be steel-cut oats, crushed oats, or rolled oats
Occasionally, brown sugar, honey, jelly, or other items are added to oatmeal
It makes a tasty treat for all to enjoy.
It is looked forward to as a light meal.

title: History of the U.S.
textArray: Three-hundred years ago, America was not a country
It was part of Britain
However, many American people wanted to be free and start a new country
A man named Paul Revere helped America get freedom
Paul Revere was born in December 1734 in Boston, Massachusetts
Paul Revere soon joined a group called the Sons of Liberty
The Sons of Liberty wanted American people to be free from Britain
Other famous members of the group were John Adams, John Hancock, Patrick Henry, and Samuel Adams
In April of 1775, the British army was in Boston and many people thought they were going to fight the Sons of Liberty
The Sons of Liberty were watching the British army carefully, so they could prepare to protect their homes
Paul Revere was in Boston when the British army came
He wanted to tell the other members of the Sons of Liberty, but they were in Lexington (another city)
Therefore, he and three other men rode horses to Lexington
They all went different directions
Paul Revere also thought, “Maybe the British will come on the land, and maybe they will come on the Charles River
I don’t know!
Therefore, he told someone in Boston to put big lights in a church
He said, “One if by land, two if by sea.
This means: if the British come on land, put one light in the church
If they come on the river, put two lights
Then everyone can see and get ready
In conclusion, Paul Revere and other men in the Sons of Liberty helped the army get ready to fight the British army
This helped to free American from the Britain
Now, “freedom” is a very important idea in American culture.

title: Changes in Chinatown
textArray: In Boston, Chinatown is changing
About 100 years ago, many immigrants lived here
They were Irish, Jewish, Italian, and Chinese
Now, 70% of people in Chinatown are Asian
There are many businesses in Chinatown
There are food businesses, restaurants, and travel businesses
In 2013 and 2014, businesses are building many expensive apartments
These apartments are very big and beautiful, but they are expensive
Some apartments are $48,000 a year, but the average family’s income in Chinatown is only $14,289 a year
This is a big problem
Many immigrants cannot live in Chinatown because it is too expensive
They need to go to another place to live
Sometimes there are events in Chinatown
These events aim to educate everyone about the changes and problems in Chinatown.

title: Factory Farms
textArray: Many farms that produce meat put too many animals in a small space
These animals live inside, in dirty places, and they do not have enough space to move around
The food companies do not care about the animals’ health, because they want the animals to grow big very fast
This kind of farming is called “factory farming.” Factory farming is not healthy for animals, because they live so close together
If one animal gets sick, all of the animals get sick
Farmers try to prevent this
They give antibiotics to the animals (strong medicine)
Also, farmers give drugs to the animals to make them grow fast
If people eat the animals later, they eat the antibiotics and drugs
This is unhealthy
However, recently some companies are trying to give a good life to their animals
They show the customers where the animals live, and they prove the animals have a good life
This makes the animals healthy, and it makes the customers happy when they buy the meat, eggs, or dairy

title: History of Halloween
textArray: Halloween is a very old holiday and it has changed a lot

Halloween started 2000 years ago with people who lived
near Ireland, the UK, and France
These people were called the Celts

The Celts celebrated the new year on November
1st, because the seasons change at this time
Also, they think living people and dead people become closer at this time
On October 31st, they celebrated a holiday called Samhain (pronounced sow-in)
On this night, they think the ghosts come back to Earth
The ghosts can make problems, but they can help people, too
For example, they can talk to people about the future
The Celts wear animal costumes and make fires to celebrate this holiday
After many years, the Christian religion made a similar holiday
It was called “All Soul’s Day.” People wear costumes, make fires, and celebrate dead people
Now, the name of this holiday is “Halloween.” Today in the United States, children usually go outside on Halloween and ask for candy to celebrate
American people spend $6,000,000,000 on Halloween every year
Children and adults wear funny costumes, scary costumes, and beautiful costumes
People play games and have parties
